model

Class ModelFacade

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.ModelFacade
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IModel
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Moving

    public class ModelFacade
extends java.lang.Object
implements IModel

    The Class ModelFacade provides a facade of the Model component.

    Version:
    HeartGold-SoulSilver
    Author:
    Marand Virgile, Lhermine Ludovic, Quatremare Bryan and Blin Clément.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static char[][] map
      Initialization of map which is going to contain the entire map as a 2D array and with a constant size of 992 by 992.
      private static java.lang.String mapString
      Initialization of mapString, a String which is going to contain the entire map (as a String).

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ModelFacade()
      Instantiates a new model facade.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void buildTab()
      The method buildTab which have to fill the 2D array map with the content of the mapString String.
      char[][] getMap()
      That getter is here to allow other classes to recover the new 2D array previously filled.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • mapString

        private static java.lang.String mapString
        Initialization of mapString, a String which is going to contain the entire map (as a String).

      • map

        private static char[][] map
        Initialization of map which is going to contain the entire map as a 2D array and with a constant size of 992 by 992.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ModelFacade

        public ModelFacade()
        Instantiates a new model facade. is calling buildTab.

    • Method Detail

      • buildTab

        public static void buildTab()
        The method buildTab which have to fill the 2D array map with the content of the mapString String. That String is previously filled with a String from the database recordings.

      • getMap

        public char[][] getMap()
        That getter is here to allow other classes to recover the new 2D array previously filled.
        Specified by:
        getMap in interface IModel
